allowCDN.title: Allow execution from CDN?
allowCDN.description: Whether to allow execution of modules directly from CDN. Setting to `always` is insecure.

trustedCDNPackages.title: Trusted CDN packages

requirejsCDN.title: Base URL of a CDN for requirejs
requirejsCDN.description: URL from which the unknown packages should be loaded, e.g. https://unpkg.com/

urls.title: Plugin URLs
urls.description: List of URL strings that will be fetched and loaded as plugins automatically on startup.

showIconInLauncher.title: Show icon in launcher
showIconInLauncher.description: Whether to show the Plugin Playground icon in the lanucher.

plugins.title: Plugins
plugins.description: List of strings of plugin text to load automatically. Line breaks are encoded as '\n'

disabled.title: Whether the item is ignored or not

icon.title: Item icon id
icon.description: If defined, it will override the command icon

label.title: Item label
label.description: If defined, it will override the command label
